meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>cage</radical> there are some <radical>legs</radical>. They are the legs attached to a <kanji>small animal</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You look up through the cloth, and see a hairless cat. This <kanji>small animal</kanji> is hairless, but most surprisingly is covered in <reading>hickie</reading>s (ひき).
